name: Slime Slammer
description:
Defend yourself against slimes with a giant flail in this game made

for the 2021 gmtk gamejam. Slimes will approach you from all sides, see how long you can survive and how many waves you can defeat.

The theme of the jam was: "Joined together"

Its incorporated into this entry by having your main weapon be a flail with a physics simulation, so that you cant accurately aim, but rather have to move to make it fly into enemies.

Additional Info:

Teamsize: 1 Person

Time spend: ~30h

Programming Language: Beeflang

Engine: Selfmade + SDL2 "backend"

Graphics: Selfmade (Krita)

Fonts: Old newspaper font,  sono regular

Soundeffects: Bfxr

Menu Controls:

W/S:  choose option

Enter: Select

Ingame Controls:

W/A/S/D move

Left mouse: Launch flail

F: Fullscreen

alt+1: Screenshot

alt + 2 = toggle debug menu

alt + 3 = toggle hud

alt + 4 = toggle rendering

alt + 5 = toggle pause

alt + 6 = reset scene

How to play:

Unzip, go into the folder and doubleclick the .exe file
